typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		S_SUPPKEY as integer,
		S_NAME as string,
		S_ADDRESS as string,
		S_NATIONKEY as integer,
		S_PHONE as string,
		S_ACCTBAL as decimal(15,2),
		S_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Supplier
source(output(
		N_NATIONKEY as integer,
		N_NAME as string,
		N_REGIONKEY as integer,
		N_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Nation
Supplier, Nation join(S_SUPPKEY == N_NATIONKEY,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'both')~> SupplierNationJoin
SupplierNationJoin split(isNull(S_ADDRESS),
	disjoint: true) ~> NullFilter@(SupplierNameNull, OtherWise)
NullFilter@OtherWise sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CleansedSuppData.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm:ss') ~> RightSuppData

source(output(
		Customer_Id as integer,
		Location as string,
		Cust_Key as integer,
		End_Date as date,
		Begin_Date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SCDInsertUodate
SCDInsertUodate sink(input(
		Cust_Key as integer,
		Customer_Id as integer,
		Location as string,
		Begin_Date as date,
		End_Date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		Cust_Key,
		Customer_Id,
		Location,
		Begin_Date,
		End_Date
	)) ~> SCDUpdateInsertNew

source(output(
		Customer_Id as integer,
		Location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerTrans
source(output(
		Cust_Key as integer,
		Customer_Id as integer,
		Location as string,
		Begin_Date as date,
		End_Date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustomerDim
CustomerDim filter(equals(toString(End_Date), '9999-12-31')) ~> ExtractNonExpRecs
CustomerTrans select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId = Customer_Id,
		Loc = Location
	)) ~> RenameColumns
RenameColumns, ExtractNonExpRecs join(CustomerId == Customer_Id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinSrcTarget
JoinSrcTarget derive(CheckNewRow = iif(CustomerId == Customer_Id  && Location != Loc, 1,0),
		BrandNewRow = iif(notEquals(CustomerId, iif(isNull(Customer_Id), 0, Customer_Id)) , 1, iif((CustomerId == CustomerId && Location != Loc),2,0)),
		EndDate = '9999-12-31',
		BeginDate = currentDate(),
		NewEndDate = currentDate()) ~> DeriveNewOrExisting
DeriveNewOrExisting filter(equals(BrandNewRow, 1)) ~> NewRowSelect
NewRowSelect select(mapColumn(
		Customer_Id = CustomerId,
		Location = Loc,
		Cust_Key,
		End_Date = EndDate,
		Begin_Date = BeginDate
	)) ~> NewRowToInsert
DeriveNewOrExisting filter(equals(BrandNewRow, 2)) ~> UpdatedRows
UpdatedRows select(mapColumn(
		Location = Loc,
		Cust_Key,
		Customer_Id,
		End_Date = EndDate,
		Begin_Date = BeginDate
	)) ~> SelectUpdateInsert
UpdatedRows select() ~> UpdateUpdate
NewRowToInsert, SelectUpdateInsert union(byName: true)~> UnionInserts
UnionInserts keyGenerate(output(Cust_Key as long),
	startAt: 10L) ~> GenSk
GenSk sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['testr.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UpdateAndNewInserts
UpdateUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TestML.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		Cust_Key,
		Customer_Id,
		Location,
		End_Date = NewEndDate
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UpdateExisting
